languages.text: "Это — мой бывший дворовой... Тимо. Ряженный! Он здорово притворяется, но истинную знать ему не обмануть". {n}Девушка ловко ставит отметку на застывшего в ужасе подсудимого и сует инфоклеймо обратно вам в руку. В ее глазах горят мстительные огоньки. Дама в золотой маске одаривает Ренку снисходительным кивком.{/n}

"This is my former house servant... Timo... dressed as a noble! He is good, but he could never fool the true nobility." {n}The young woman deftly marks the man, who is frozen in horror, and pushes the data-brand back into your hand. Vengeful sparks play in her eyes. The woman in the golden mask graces her with a patronising nod.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Это — мой бывший дворовой... Тимо. Ряженный! "This is my former house servant... Timo. Dressed as a noble! He is good, but he could never fool the true nobility." {n}Leaving the man stunned with horror, Renka deftly pokes him with the data-brand, vengeful sparks playing in her eyes. The woman in the golden mask graces her with a patronising nod.{/n}

languages.text: “这个老人是我曾经的仆人……提梅……他打扮成了贵族的样子！他是个好人，但他瞒不过真正的贵族。”{n}老人被吓呆了，莲卡举起数据印章，毫不犹豫地在他身上打下了印记。随后，她将印章塞回你的手中，眼中闪烁着复仇的火花。见此情形，戴着金色面具的女士带着居高临下的姿态，向她点头致意。{/n}
languages.original_text: "This is my former house servant... Timo... dressed as a noble! He is good, but he could never fool the true nobility." {n}The young woman deftly marks the man, who is frozen in horror, and pushes the data-brand back into your hand. Vengeful sparks play in her eyes. The woman in the golden mask graces her with a patronising nod.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “这个老人是我曾经的仆人……提梅……他打扮成了贵族的样子！他是个好人，但他瞒不过真正的贵族。”{n}老人被吓呆了，莲卡举起数据印章，毫不犹豫地在他身上打下了印记。随后，她将印章塞回你的手中，眼中闪烁着复仇的火花。见此情形，戴着金色面具的女士带着居高临下的姿态，向她点头致意。{/n}

languages.text: 「この者は、私のかつての家の使用人…ティモです…貴族の装いなんてして！彼は優秀ですが、真の貴族を欺けるはずがありません」{n}その男が恐怖に打ちのめされている間に、女性は巧みにデータ刻印を押し当て、データ刻印をあなたに戻す。復讐の炎がその瞳に揺れている。黄金の仮面をつけた女性は、彼女に恩着せがましくうなずいた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "This is my former house servant... Timo... dressed as a noble! He is good, but he could never fool the true nobility." {n}The young woman deftly marks the man, who is frozen in horror, and pushes the data-brand back into your hand. Vengeful sparks play in her eyes. The woman in the golden mask graces her with a patronising nod.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「この者は、私のかつての家の使用人…ティモです…貴族の装いなんてして！彼は優秀ですが、真の貴族を欺けるはずがありません」{n}その男が恐怖に打ちのめされている間に、レンカは巧みにデータ刻印を押し当てた。復讐の炎がその瞳に揺れている。黄金の仮面をつけた女性は、彼女に恩着せがましくうなずいた。{/n}

languages.text: «Este es mi antiguo sirviente doméstico... Timo... ¡disfrazado de noble! Es un buen siervo, pero jamás podría engañar a la verdadera nobleza». {n}La joven marca con destreza al hombre, paralizado por el terror, y devuelve la marca de datos a tu mano. En sus ojos brillan chispas de rencor. La mujer de la máscara dorada asiente con gesto condescendiente.{/n}
languages.original_text: "This is my former house servant... Timo... dressed as a noble! He is good, but he could never fool the true nobility." {n}The young woman deftly marks the man, who is frozen in horror, and pushes the data-brand back into your hand. Vengeful sparks play in her eyes. The woman in the golden mask graces her with a patronising nod.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Este es mi antiguo sirviente doméstico... Timo... ¡disfrazado de noble! Es un buen siervo, pero jamás podría engañar a la verdadera nobleza». {n}La joven marca con destreza al hombre, paralizado por el terror, y devuelve la marca de datos a tu mano. En sus ojos brillan chispas de rencor. La mujer de la máscara dorada asiente con gesto condescendiente.{/n}

languages.text: "Hanemin eski hizmetkârı bu... Adı Timo... Soylu gibi giyinmiş! İyidir ama gerçek soyluları kandıramaz." {n}Genç kadın, dehşet içinde donup kalan adamı ustalıkla işaretliyor ve veri damgasını tekrar eline tutuşturuyor. Gözlerinde intikamcı kıvılcımlar çakıyor. Altın maskeli kadın başıyla onu küçümser şekilde selamlıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "This is my former house servant... Timo... dressed as a noble! He is good, but he could never fool the true nobility." {n}The young woman deftly marks the man, who is frozen in horror, and pushes the data-brand back into your hand. Vengeful sparks play in her eyes. The woman in the golden mask graces her with a patronising nod.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Hanemin eski hizmetkârı bu... Adı Timo... Soylu gibi giyinmiş! İyidir ama gerçek soyluları kandıramaz." {n}Genç kadın, dehşet içinde donup kalan adamı ustalıkla işaretliyor ve veri damgasını tekrar eline tutuşturuyor. Gözlerinde intikamcı kıvılcımlar çakıyor. Altın maskeli kadın başıyla onu küçümser şekilde selamlıyor.{/n}

languages.text: « C'est un serviteur de mon ancienne maison... Timo... affublé en noble ! Il est doué, mais il ne pourrait jamais tromper de véritables nobles. » {n}D'un geste assuré, la jeune femme marque l'homme figé par la peur, avant de reposer le fer à marquer numérique dans votre main. Une lueur vengeresse brille dans ses yeux, tandis que la femme au masque doré approuve d'un hochement de tête condescendant.{/n}
languages.original_text: "This is my former house servant... Timo... dressed as a noble! He is good, but he could never fool the true nobility." {n}The young woman deftly marks the man, who is frozen in horror, and pushes the data-brand back into your hand. Vengeful sparks play in her eyes. The woman in the golden mask graces her with a patronising nod.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « C'est un serviteur de mon ancienne maison... Timo... affublé en noble ! Il est doué, mais il ne pourrait jamais tromper de véritables nobles. » {n}D'un geste assuré, la jeune femme marque l'homme figé par la peur, avant de reposer le fer à marquer numérique dans votre main. Une lueur vengeresse brille dans ses yeux, tandis que la femme au masque doré approuve d'un hochement de tête condescendant.{/n}

languages.text: "Das ist ein früherer Hausdiener ... Timo ... verkleidet als Adliger! Er ist ein guter Mensch, könnte aber nie jemanden von echtem Adel täuschen." {n}Die junge Frau markiert ohne Zögern den Mann, der vor Angst erstarrt ist, und drückt dir das Datenbrandeisen wieder in die Hand. Funken der Rachsucht tanzen in ihren Augen. Die Frau mit der goldenen Maske nickt ihr herablassend zu.{/n}

Funken der Rachsucht tanzen in ihren Augen. Die Frau mit der goldenen Maske nickt ihr herablassend zu.{/n}
